title: HELP ME PLEASE
body:
Dear Riot

(Jebem Vam Mater) Today i was playing league and i had 115 Fps And 50 ping and it was lagging can u tell me wat was the reason i was so nervus because i needed that win to get in promotion but i didnt becouse of that problem can u pls reply to me becouse i wanna cry right now i want to drink some bleac PICKE JEDNE SMRDLJIVE.

replies.body:
It sucks to start having fps issues through such an important moment, and I'd like to help fix this to prevent it from happening again.  Sudden FPS issues can happe nfor a few reasons, like outdated drivers and bad game files.  Most recently, a recent Windows 10 update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has also caused fps issues for some players.  As a first step, disable that!

If the issue persists, go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your PC!  Let me know if you have any questions!
